Oblivion (2013 film).Tom Cruise: I thought Tom Cruise's performance in Collateral was really captivating. He was able to portray a villainous character with a subtle nuance that was both menacing and intriguing. It was a great departure from his usual roles and I thought he did a great job.
Oblivion (2013 film).General: Collateral is an intense and thrilling movie that keeps you on the edge of your seat. I loved the way it was shot and the way it kept you guessing throughout. The performances from Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx were phenomenal and the story was gripping. It's definitely one of those films that sticks with you after you watch it.
